document_data.name: Oasis of Solitude
document_data.mainbody: The '''Oasis of Solitude''' was located on [[Dihl al-Taif]] in [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Sitting between [[Zarif]] and the [[Al-Malih River]], the Oasis of Solitude was one of the last sources of fresh water on the Ghost's Route to [[Halwa]].
document_data.History: Caravans passing through the oasis typically filled any container that would hold water since they faced {{SI|200|mi|k}} of harsh terrain before the next available source of water.
